I am totally in awe. This needs no further explanation other than the fact that I want this in the next GTA.

Whether or not you followed the link before reading this, BeamNG.drive is simply the BEST driving simulator I've ever seen. I need to spread the word about this!

It uses full soft-body physics at all times, so you can get ultra-realistic crashes and other cool effects. Just watch the video if you haven't already. Oh, and the best thing about it?

The alpha costs $15 US.

I am NOT kidding.

Try Next Car Game

And why stop at GTA? I want this is the next Forza!

I just bought this, but I need to wait 4 days until I get home to play it D:

Next car game is very dumbed down in the actual race modes, and the cars are way too reinforced. Also, I don't think this will be in GTA for the next ten years, as your console or average computer will not be able to handle the game ALONGSIDE soft body vehicle physics.
Driving simulator, no. Physics simulator, yes. It does pretty damn good at the crashing and smashing and bashing, but the driving model is like driving on ice. Even with a wheel.
Imagine if something like this was implemented into KSP! (Hey a can dream, right?)
